transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Sir is it Ravi sir from Patel Mohin Mohin Kumar Sulesh bhai company sir?

Customer: Hanji.

Executive: Sir Pravesh Sharma this side from IndiaMART head office Noida premier manager. Sir abhi na aapki baat hui thi abhi aapke jo current account manager hai Raju Maurya ji to aapne feedback share kara aap satisfy nahi hai unse baat karke thoda mujhe batayenge sir kya issue face kar rahe the aap?

Customer: Sir maine unko bola ke dekho jab mera renew aaya tha na IndiaMART pe abhi haal filhal haal hi mein renew hua hai mera naya. Ji ji. Ji. To maine unko bola ke renew se pehle wo bol rahe the ke buylead ko aapko consume karni padegi wo to main samajh gaya main lekin jab mera renew aaya tha na usse do mahine pehle se maine itni buylead consume nahi ki thi karna hi band kar diya kyuki sare customer mil nahi rahe the mujhe acche wale. To maine bilkul band kar diya IndiaMART application use karna hi band kar diya tha. Fir bhi aapki or se aapki team ne aisi mehnat ki thi uske samne se mere paas call aa rahe the sare buyer ke. Aur unse mere ko accha response mila to maine unko bola ke buylead to hum consume karenge lekin aapki or se bhi koi samne wali party jab koi post karti hai to unko premium seat chahiye ya panel seat through bhi chahiye. To unko mera reference milna chahiye to wo mujhe call kare wo kaam kaise ho raha tha do teen mahine se IndiaMART mein. To abhi band ho gaya renew hone ke baad.

Executive: Nahi nahi sir aisa. Wo mana kar rahe the.

Executive: Main aapko batata hu sir kya hota hai. I think aapka aaj se teen char mahine pehle renewal tha tab aapne renewal nahi kara aapne service renew nahi karai iski. Right sir. Jab aap jab aap sir service ke renewal nahi karate hai to hamare yaha pe retention department hota hai retention clients jo customer se baat karte hai ki aapko pure saal kya problem rahi aur unka kaam yahi hota hai ki aapko dobara se paid customer banana aur jaise hi paid customer bane kyuki wo sirf paid customer pe hi kaam karte hai. To is vajah se sir ye account manage change nahi hua but Raju akele nahi hai sir jo aapka account dekh rahe hai Raju ke upar sir unke manager Aditya hai unke upar main hu. Hum sare sir ispe work karenge agar aapko pehle bhi business mila to aap bhi samajh sakte hai sir ki 5 lakh paid customer hai IndiaMART ke employee 7000 hai koi hand pick karke nahi de raha hai. Aapko activity maintain rakhiye hum check karenge aap kaise use kar rahe ho 100% main aapko assurance deta hu aapko improvement dikhega sir. Agar aapko abhi mil raha hai to aage bhi milta rahega. Mujhe buyleads to main consume karta hu wo to theek hai lekin aap bhi partyo ke samne reference dijiye hamara ki usse sir hum kaam mein hote hai pura din to application dekh ke nahi baithe sakte na IndiaMART ki. Main samajh raha hu. Application mein kon sa customer aapko apni need dal dega wo to humko kaise pata rahega. Jab hum kaam mein hai usi time pe usne dal diye to hamare se buylead consume karke koi aur le jayega.

Executive: Nahi nahi main samajh raha hu main sir dekhiye hum bhi jaise pura din laptop pe rehte hai main unse bolunga Raju ki din mein ek do baar hum bhi lead check karke dalte rahenge but thoda kya hai na sir ki ab aapka jo product hai na sir jis product mein aap deal karte hai aapka product aisa nahi hai sir ki matlab koi bhi usko bech le thoda knowledge required rehta hai right sir. Matlab kafi cheeze hoti hai isme quality quantity samne kaisa to hame to har cheez ek hi jaisi lagegi comment seat dikha to comment seat panel seat dikha to panel seat ab isme aap kitna quantity karte hai wo aap batayega hum isme aapki help ke liye baithe hai sir is saal agar aapne IndiaMART ko mauka diya to 100% main aapko assure kar raha hu Raju se main bolunga har hafte ya 10 din mein hum ek baar aapke sath review bhi kare hum dekhenge kis time pe buylead ka jyada availability rehta hai din ka kitna average rehta hai matlab kitne din mein kya average reh raha hai. Mere se ho sakta hai meri 17 lead hai per hafte ki one week ki wo to main consume kar lunga lekin main kaam mein bhi rehta hu fir kis hisab se maine do mahine mein nahi bhi dekh pata hu. Jab season chalu hogi tab main free nahi rahunga. Us time pe aap to reference dijiye party ko kyuki do teen mahine se maine dekha do teen mahine se IndiaMART mein completely work ho raha tha hamare liye. Fir renew hone ke baad aap party chhod dete ho fir dusre saal renew aane ke waqt aap usko pakadte ho aisa mat karo.

Executive: Nahi nahi koi nahi chhodta sir koi nahi chhodta hai pure India mein sir mere. Sir to maine dekha hai pichli saal maine dekha hai pichle saal maine dekha hai che aath mahine tak aapki or se nahi koi call aa raha jab renew hone ka time aaya tab do mahine se chalu ho gaye continuous call.

Executive: Main samajh raha hu ek kaam kar lete hai main aapke sath ek whatsapp group bana leta hu jisme main bhi rahunga Raju Maurya bhi rahega. Wahi bol raha hu. Ha main abhi wo bana raha hu Patel Mohin Kumar ke naam se main group bana raha hu aap bhi group pe daliye hum bhi kuch na kuch issue aapko lage ki Raju respond nahi kar raha mujhe daliye main aapse baat karunga. Main Aditya baat karenge hum teeno isme add rahenge aur ensure karenge sir ki aapko aisa bolne ka mauka hum dobara na denge. Aapko 100% apni taraf se jo jo hamare yaha ho sakta hai hum wo pura better aapko. Ha wo wahi bol raha hu main wahi bol raha hu. Aap fikar mat kariye sir main aapse har 10 15 din mein connect karunga baki sir ye aapka not certificate ka feedback aata hai ek feedback main aur aapko send karunga aapka sir aap accha feedback dijiyega jo maine aapko solution diya aur whatsapp group abhi bana raha hu aapke sath 5 minute mein. Theek hai sir. Theek hai sir. Kuch accha comment dijiyega sir agar aap baat karke. Thank you sir theek hai theek hai. Accha okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issues after subscription renewal.

- No reference from IndiaMART to parties.

- No calls received for 6-8 months.



Resolution:

- Executive created a WhatsApp group.

- Assured better support and regular reviews.

- Promised to address concerns.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send feedback form.

- Executive will connect in 10-15 days.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, buyleads, support, renewal, reference
